attributes.action: Ronnie O’Sullivan to be given a Knighthood in 2025 New Years Honours list
attributes.additional_details: His achievements over more than 30 years are truly outstanding. It’s difficult to think of another sportsman from any other sport throughout the World that has achieved anywhere near the level of success and excellence Ronnie O’Sullivan had over more than three decades and still continues to excel.
attributes.background: Put Ronnie O’Sullivan on the New Years Honours list to receive a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
